Episodes.Title: Zeelander
Episodes.Plot: It's Morningside Fashion Week, and one of the world's top fashion designers discovers Jeff da Maori and catapults him to international catwalk fame.

Episodes.Title: Survival of the Fattest
Episodes.Plot: The class sets out for a day in the bush , but the boys get lost and stranded in the wilderness.

Episodes.Title: Honky The Wonder Horse
Episodes.Plot: After Vale and Valea feel sorry for a racehorse who is about to reach its expiry date, they try and persuade Dad to let them train and race it.

Episodes.Title: Touched By A Teacher
Episodes.Plot: When Mack tries to impress his mates by inventing a story about being abused , Brother Ken gets thrown into jail and a witch-hunt ensues.

Episodes.Title: Half Caste
Episodes.Plot: The boys find a baby in the creek and try to bring it up , but struggle from sleep deprivation and the ordeal of nappy-changing until they have to search elsewhere for parents for the baby.

Episodes.Title: A Chicken Roll At My Table
Episodes.Plot: Joost's conservation-loving zoo-keeping Dad invites the boys to the van Den Van Van's African-themed Morningside Shore home for a weekend cultural exchange , but an incident with a chicken roll turns the weekend into a weird kind of Whodunit.

Episodes.Title: Morningside Story
Episodes.Plot: An incident of racial abuse inspires St Sylvester's to produce a multi-racial musical love story called Morningside Story. Vale is director, Jeff in charge of music, Sione, Sina, Mack and Rex are the stars.
